description.name: Auto bump trimmer head for brush cutter
description.long_desc:
The trimmer head is equipped with a quick line winding system without the need to dismantle the body - just thread the line and wind it by turning the outer knob. Compatible with all brushcutters equipped with bevel gears with left-hand thread M10x1.25.


Product features:



  • easy assembly

  • reeling the line without disassembling the body

  • tap-n-go function

  • ergonomic button for winding the line

  • durable housing

  • strong mounting thread

  • plastic-rubber fasteners

  • suitable for fishing line with a diameter of 1.5 to 3.0 mm

  • fits most trimmers available on the market with a left-hand thread M10 x 1.25

  • The set includes a line with a diameter of 2.4 mm (wound on the head)

description.name: Multifunctional neck LED lamp
description.long_desc:
Adjustable LED neck light with two independent light sources. A highly multifunctional gadget, perfect for reading books, and various types of precise work in which it is important to illuminate the workplace from two sides. It will also be used when performing various types of workshop work.


Two independent light sources have the ability to adjust the light intensity in 3 steps and allow you to choose the color of the light (warm/neutral/cold).


Equipped with a built-in 1000mAh battery, charged using the most popular USB type C connector.


Product characteristics:



  • high quality

  • easy to be shaped, flexible arms

  • 3-step light intensity adjustment

  • choice of light color (warm/neutral / cold)

  • built-in rechargeable battery

  • equipped with a USB type C connection


Technical data:


Material: plastic/silicone


Light source: two SMD LEDs


Light color: warm (3000K) / neutral (4000K) / cold (6000K)


Light intensity: 15lm / 30lm / 60lm


Battery capacity: 1000mAh


Charging time: approx. 2.5 hours


Working time: 4-80 hours (depending on light intensity)


Connection: USB-C

description.name: Heating torch with side working range button
description.long_desc:
Gas burner with brass nozzle. It has a smooth regulation of the size of the flame. Designed for use with gas cartridges. Using a gas burner, you can easily light the grill, and remove old paint or solder elements made of, for example, copper.


Product characteristics:



  • built into the power adjustment knob

  • Power 1.3 kW

  • Temperature up to 1300°C

  • Powered by butane gas from an external cylinder - in accordance with EN417. TWIST connection

description.name: Camping stove for cartridges
description.long_desc:
Mini kuchenka turystyczna zasilana przy pomocy naboi/kartuszy gazowych 190g. Niewielkie gabaryty oraz waga kuchenki, czynią ją niezastąpionym urządzeniem podczas biwaków oraz innych wypadów w teren.

Kuchenka wyposażona w zapalnik piezo oraz regulację płomienia.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • niewielki rozmiar i waga kuchenki
  • korpus wykonany z tworzywa sztucznego
  • niezastąpiona podczas biwaków itp.
  • wyposażona w zapalnik piezo oraz pokrętło do regulacji wielkości płomienia
  • zasilana nabojami gazowymi 190g
  • posiada mosiężny zawór gazowy

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Moc: 1100W

Materiał: stal nierdzewna / tworzywo sztuczne

Zużycie gazu: 80 g/h

Zapłon: piezoelektryczny

Zasilanie: kartusz gazowy 190g zgodny z EN 417

Wymiary (średnica x wysokość): 140 x 210 mm

description.name: Mini camping stove for cartridges
description.long_desc:
Mini kuchenka turystyczna zasilana przy pomocy naboi/kartuszy gazowych o pojemności 400 ml. Niewielkie gabaryty oraz waga kuchenki, czynią ją niezastąpionym urządzeniem podczas każdej dłuższej pieszej wędrówki, wypadów na rower lub biwak. Cztery rozkładane nóżki oraz ramiona pod naczynia pozwolą w wygodny sposób zagotować wodę, a także przyrządzić posiłek w warunkach polowych.

Kuchenka wyposażona w zapalnik piezo oraz regulację płomienia. W zestawie znajduję się materiałowe etui na kuchenkę ułatwiające transport oraz przechowywanie.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • niewielki rozmiar i waga kuchenki – nawet nie odczujesz ze masz ją w plecaku
  • wykonana ze stali nierdzewnej
  • niezastąpiona podczas wypadów rowerowych, pieszych wędrówek, biwaków itp.
  • wyposażona w zapalnik piezo oraz pokrętło do regulacji wielkości płomienia
  • rozkładane nóżki oraz ramiona pod naczynia
  • w zestawie materiałowe etui

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Moc: 2800W
  • Materiał: stal nierdzewna
  • Zużycie gazu: 100 g/h
  • Zapłon: piezoelektryczny
  • Czas zagotowanie 1l wody: 4 min
  • Maksymalne obciążenie: 5 kg
  • Maksymalna średnica naczynia: 26 cm
  • Wymiary złożonej kuchenki (szer. x wys. x gł.): 110 x 87 x 115 mm
  • Wymiary rozłożonej kuchenki (szer. x wys. x gł.): 160 x 87 x 160 mm
  • Waga: 416

description.name: 6” ABS felling wedge
description.long_desc:
Wood splitting wedge made of durable ABS plastic. Wedge with dimensions of 152x66x25mm and a weight of 115g, the special shape allows you to quickly split wood using less force. Handy and easy to fit in the slot.


Product features:
wedge weighing 115 g
made of durable ABS plastic
easy to fit in the slot, no additional tools required
quick splitting of thicker pieces of wood and logs
allows you to use much less force than when using a traditional ax


Technical Specifications:


Weight: 115g


Material: ABS plastic


Length: 152mm


Width: 66mm


Thickness: 25mm


Colour: Blue

description.name: 10” ABS felling wedge
description.long_desc:
Klin do rozłupywania drewna wykonany z wytrzymałego tworzywa ABS. Klin o wymiarach 254x89x30,5mm i wadze 304g, specjalny kształt pozwala na szybkie rozszczepienie drewna przy użyciu mniejszej siły. Poręczny i łatwy do zamocowania w szczelinie.


Charakterystyka produktu:



  • klin o wadze 262 g

  • wykonany z wytrzymałego tworzywa ABS

  • łatwy do zamocowania w szczelinie, bez konieczności korzystania z dodatkowych narzędzi

  • szybkie rozszczepianie grubszych kawałków drewna oraz pni

  • pozwala na użycie znacznie mniejszej siły niż w przypadku korzystania z siekiery tradycyjnej


Specyfikacja techniczna:


Waga: 262 g


Materiał: tworzywo ABS


Długość: 254 mm


Szerokość: 89 mm


Grubość: 30,5 mm


Kolor: niebieski
description.short_desc:

description.name: 12L seed spreader
description.long_desc:
Universal seed spreader with a capacity of 12 l, significantly speeds up the sowing of seeds. Perfect for sowing and fertilizing grass in summer, while in the winter for spreading road salt. The seeder precisely and evenly distributes the seeds over a width of 46.5 cm. With 10-step regulation of the amount of sown seeds.


The light and handy spreader equipped with road wheels makes work easy and pleasant. Manufactured from durable plastic.


Product features:



  • lightweight construction made of durable plastic

  • a tank that can hold up to 12 liters

  • 10-step regulation of the amount of sown seeds

  • makes work lighter, more comfortable, faster and, above all, more accurate

  • during the winter - perfect for sprinkling salt on the pavement or entering the property

  • long and comfortable handle, for easy and accurate control of sowing

  • quick and easy assembly and disassembly - no need to use any tools


Technical Specifications:


Brand: John Gardener


Power: manual


Sowing width: 46.5 cm


Adjustment of the amount of sown material: yes, 10-step


Seed tank capacity: 12 l


Purpose: spreading material of various sizes (fertilizer, sand, salt, seeds)


Width: 56.5 cm


Height: 108 cm

description.name: 5pcs Sliders Furniture Lifter 150kg
description.long_desc:
A set of stands with rollers designed for transporting and placing furniture or other loads weighing up to 150 kg.


A steel lever is used to lift the load before inserting the roller coasters.


Intended use / application


For transporting, moving and positioning furniture and other loads weighing up to 150 kg


Usage


Lift the edge, the corner of the furniture using the lever, insert the plate with the roller and lower the load. Do the same with the other rolls.


Technical Specifications:


Material: high quality plastic


Load capacity: up to 150 kg (37.5 kg per roll)

description.name: Universal wrench double-sided 5-27mm / 5-15mm CrV
description.long_desc:
Dwustronny, oczkowy klucz nastawny wykonany z wytrzymałej stali narzędziowej CrV. Śruba zapewnia płynna regulacje w zakresie 5-15 mm oraz 15-27 mm. Cztery punkty styku ze śrubą umożliwiają przenoszenie dużej siły. Przystosowany do śrub metryczny jak i calowych.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • wykonany ze stali narzędziowej CrV
  • śruba regulacyjna pozwala łatwy i szybki sposób dopasować rozmiar klucza do danej śruby/nakrętki
  • płynna regulacja w zakresie 5-15 mm oraz 15-27 mm
  • przystosowany do śrub metrycznych oraz calowych

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał: stal narzędziowa CrV

Rozmiar: 5-15 mm oraz 15-27 mm

Długość całkowita: 237 mm

description.name: 2,7L battery seed spreader
description.long_desc:
A manual seed spreader powered by four AA batteries significantly speeds up seed sowing. Perfect for sowing and fertilizing grass. The spreader precisely and evenly distributes the seeds up to 2 m. Equipped with an adjustable rotational speed of the spreading mechanism.


Light and handy design that allows you to hold up to 2.7l of seeds. Manufactured from durable plastic.


Product features:



  • lightweight construction made of durable plastic

  • a tank that can hold up to 2.7 liters of seeds

  • powered by four AA batteries

  • has a regulation of the rotational speed of the spreading mechanism

  • the adjustment of the rotational speed

  • working with a seeder is more efficient, more comfortable, faster, and, above all, more accurate

  • during the winter, perfect for sprinkling salt on the pavement or entering the property


Technical Specifications:


Brand: John Gardener


Power supply: 4x AA battery (not included)


Rotation speed: 700-1800 rpm


Spreading radius: up to 2m (the radius depends on the rotational speed)


Amount of sown material: 15 - 50 gr./m2


Seed tank capacity: 2.7 l

description.name: Set of insulating tapes 19mm x 0.13mm x 5m – 10 pcs. (5 colors)
description.long_desc:
Set of 10 insulating tapes in different colors. The tapes are characterized by very good insulating properties, made using PVC and rubber-based adhesive. It is characterized by high adhesion to steel and high flexibility. The set includes 10 insulating tapes in 5 colors.


Product features:
high-quality PVC backing, rubber-based adhesive
very good adhesion to steel
high flexibility and stretch
they are perfect for electrical installations, insulation and marking of wires
The set includes 10 tapes in 5 different colors


Technical Specifications:


Width: 19mm


Thickness: 0.13mm


Length: 5m


Electrical strength: 600V


Breaking force: 26N/10mm


Tensile strength: 18N/mm


Stretch: 150%


Temperature range: -18°C to +80°C

description.name: Cloth fabric tape for cable bundles 19mm x 15m
description.long_desc:
Cloth insulation tape is most often used in the automotive industry when mounting alarms, Car Audio systems, and central locks, as well as when repairing electrical installations. Highly flexible tape is perfect for bundling and protecting cables


Product features:



  • perfect for bundling and protecting cables

  • is characterized by high flexibility, perfectly soundproofing and highly resistant to abrasion

  • guarantees strong adhesion

  • made of PET wool and rubber-based adhesive

Tape length: 15 m


Tape width: 19mm


Support material: PET wool


Adhesive Type: Rubber based

description.name: Spade drill bit for wood 28x152mm HEX
description.long_desc:
Spade drill designed for cutting wood, laminated veneer lumber, chipboard, etc. Made of high-quality carbon steel. Can be used with hand drills, screwdrivers and bench drills. It has a hexagonal shank that allows you to securely fix the drill bit in the drilling head.


Product features:


made of high-quality carbon steel
designed for making holes in wood, laminated veneer lumber, chipboard, etc.
drill bit with a diameter of 28mm and a total length of 152mm
hexagonal shank
ground centering point enables precise drilling


Technical Specifications:


Material: carbon steel


Diameter: 28mm


Overall length: 152mm


Handle: hexagonal


Purpose: wood, laminated veneer lumber, chipboards, etc.

category.path: Tools for Electricians\Electric Meters

category_idosell.path: Tools for Electricians\Electric Meters

description.name: Universal cables for multimeter + crocodile clips
description.long_desc:
Measurement cables with a total length of 106cm, designed for electric meters, will facilitate precise and safe measurements. On one end, these cables have solidly made angled plugs with covered 4mm tips, ensuring a stable and secure connection to the meter.


On the other end, the cables are equipped with measurement probes of 150mm length, allowing easy access to hard-to-reach measuring points. Thanks to them, accurate measurements will now be possible even in tight spaces. The set also includes a complete set of crocodile clips, to which measurement probes can be easily attached.


Product characteristics:



  • Total cable length of 106cm, providing convenience during measurements.

  • Solidly made angled plugs with covered 4mm tips on one end, ensuring a safe and stable connection to the meter.

  • Measurement probes of 150mm length on the other end, allowing easy access to hard-to-reach measuring points.

  • The set includes crocodile clips, allowing easy connection of measurement probes to other elements.

category.name: Diamond Discs for Cutting Building Materials
category.path: Cutting Tools\Diamond Tools\Diamond Discs for Cutting Building Materials

category_idosell.path: Cutting Tools\Diamond Tools\Diamond Discs for Cutting Building Materials

description.name: Diamond Grinding Cup Wheel GEKO 180 mm
description.long_desc:
Diamond Grinding Cup Wheel GEKO 180 mm


The diamond grinding cup wheel is perfect for angle grinders to grind concrete and masonry. Removes all irregularities. 


The double-segmented blade gives it the flexibility to prevent cracks and offer the roughest cut.


Application: Ideal for very hard to medium hard stones. Concrete, ceramic brick, paving stones, paving slabs, terrace slabs.


Product features



  • diameter - 180 mm

  • bore diameter - 22,2 mm

  • segment height - 5 mm

  • for wet/dry grinding

  • cooling holes increase longevity and durability

description.name: Diamond Turbo Row Cup Wheel 180x22,2mm
description.long_desc:
Tarcza diamentowa do szlifowania Turbo GEKO 180 mm

Tarcza garnkowa segmentowa diamentowa do szlifowania betonu idealnie nadaje się do szlifowania powierzchni betonowych i podobnych. Usuwa wszystkie nierówności, nadlewy, górki, zanieczyszczenia itp.

Element szlifujący tzw. TURBO - do stosowania na sucho i mokro.

Zastosowanie: Idealna do bardzo twardych i średnio twardych kamieni. Beton, cegła ceramiczna, kostka brukowa, płyty chodnikowe, płyty tarasowe.

Cechy produktu

  • średnica - 180 mm
  • otwór montażowy - 22,2 mm
  • wysokość nasypu - 5 mm
  • do szlifowania na sucho i mokro
  • otwory chłodzące zwiększają żywotność tarczy
